title: Oath of the Horatii
description: This Neoclassical painting illustrates a story from Roman legend in which three brothers swear an oath to defend Rome.

title: Primavera
description: An allegorical celebration of spring, this painting includes several mythological figures such as Venus and the Three Graces.

title: The School of Athens
description: A grand depiction of classical philosophers, including Plato and Aristotle, set in an architectural marvel.

title: Bacchus and Ariadne
description: Depicts the god Bacchus falling in love with Ariadne at first sight, based on the mythological story.

title: Supper at Emmaus
description: A dramatic Baroque painting that shows the moment Jesus reveals himself after the resurrection.

title: The Surrender of Breda
description: Celebrates the Spanish capture of the Dutch city of Breda during the Eighty Years’ War.

title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp
description: A group portrait showing Dr. Tulp demonstrating a dissection to fellow physicians.

title: The Night Watch
description: One of the most famous Dutch Golden Age paintings, showing a city guard moving out.

title: Children’s Games
description: A lively painting depicting over 200 children engaged in nearly 80 different games.
